duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing analysis of the data operations and environmental factors to shape and inform strategic data initiatives.
Providing analytical thought leadership for big-picture strategy projects focused on the integration of organizational capabilities, functions, policies, and processes.
Developing a strategic vision for data management and analytics, setting organization objectives and goals, and planning activities to achieve those objectives.
Delivering executive-level communications to share the vision and facilitate stakeholder and leadership buy-in of strategic data initiatives.
